T02TD2748E:130b-0: @130b * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po yid rnyog pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2748E:130b-1: sa gsum dbang phyug lha gsum 'jig rten 'od mdzad ni //
T02TD2748E:130b-2: gangs ri ltar dkar skal ldan yid kyi ngal so'i rgyu //
T02TD2748E:130b-3: bde gnas mchog sbyin gcig pu rtag tu dbugs 'byin brtson gyur gang //
T02TD2748E:130b-4: dpal ldan mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang nyid rtag 'dud //
T02TD2748E:130b-5: ring nas dub pa skyabs med pa //
T02TD2748E:130b-6: rnam g-yeng rnam par gzings pa yis //
T02TD2748E:130b-7: rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
T02TD2748E:130b-8: de dag dal ba'i thabs 'di brjod //
T02TD2748E:130b-9: yid dang rjes mthun gnas su ni //
T02TD2748E:130b-10: blo ldan rnyog pa med yid kyis //
T02TD2748E:130b-11: ltos pa thams can dor nas su //
T02TD2748E:130b-12: lha gsum rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD2748E:130b-13: stong pa nyid skyes padma dang //
T02TD2748E:130b-14: bde chen las grub zla dkyil du //
T02TD2748E:130b-15: lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin rim //
T02TD2748E:130b-17: dkar dang dmar po sngon po dag / sku gsung thugs dag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2748E:130b-18: bsams la 'od spro bsdu ba yis //
T02TD2748E:130b-20: de la dbus su 'jig rten mgon //
T02TD2748E:130b-21: gzhon nu dkar sgeg mdzes pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2748E:130b-22: g-yas su khro gnyer dmar mdzes khro //
T02TD2748E:130b-23: g-yon du sgrol ma ljang dul ma'o //
T02TD2748E:130b-25: rtsa ba'i yi ge bzhis mtshan pa //
T02TD2748E:130b-26: rang gi snying pos sa bon bcas //
T02TD2748E:130b-27: gsal byas ye shes gzhug par bya //
T02TD2748E:130b-28: de nas dub pa ngal so'i phyir //
T02TD2748E:130b-29: cho ga'i sbyor bas 'gro ba yi //
T02TD2748E:130b-30: sems dul dal ba rnyed pa la //
T02TD2748E:130b-31: brtson pas gsang sngags bzlas par bya //
T02TD2748E:130b-32: rang dang rjes mthun 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2748E:130b-33: 'gro ba'i dub pa gang gi rgyu //
T02TD2748E:130b-34: chags sdang ma rig las bcas 'phros //
T02TD2748E:131a-0: @131a * // sdug bsngal dri ma bsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2748E:131a-1: de rjes mkhas pa dmigs bcas dang //
T02TD2748E:131a-2: dmigs bral rnam par mi rtog la //
T02TD2748E:131a-3: rnal 'byor gnyug mar gnas na ni //
T02TD2748E:131a-4: ma lus mtshan ma rnam grol bsgom //
T02TD2748E:131a-5: gang phyir gang du gang gis gang //
T02TD2748E:131a-6: ji ltar bcing bas bdag dub pa //
T02TD2748E:131a-7: de phyir de yis der de nyid //
T02TD2748E:131a-8: de ltar grol bas bdag dal ba'o //
T02TD2748E:131a-9: ae ma'o rnal 'byor zab mo che //
T02TD2748E:131a-11: ae ma'o rtag tu bde ba che //
T02TD2748E:131a-12: ae ma'o ae ma ngo mtshar rmad //
T02TD2748E:131a-13: yang ni dmigs bral nyid yid kyis //
T02TD2748E:131a-14: lus can dmigs med dmigs byas la //
T02TD2748E:131a-16: sbyor bas dub pa ngal so bya //
T02TD2748E:131a-17: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs srid na 'di dag mi ngal sems dub rnam pa kun tu nyon mongs dbang gyur sdug bsngal ni //
T02TD2748E:131a-18: sna tshogs kun rtogs bag chags las bcas 'dzin pa'i blos bslad mngon zhen 'ching ba dam pa'i mdud pas nyer bcings pa //
T02TD2748E:131a-19: cho ga gang gis de shes gyur na skad cig de la dpag med rgyal ba'i phyag gis rjes skyabs dri rdul med //
T02TD2748E:131a-20: snying gi dbus su bde ba che thob gzha' lus 'di dang tshangs pa'i ngag thob 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig bla mar gyur //
T02TD2748E:131a-22: dran pas brtan par byed pa yi //
T02TD2748E:131a-23: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gzhag nas //
T02TD2748E:131a-24: brtse ldan dal bus ldang bar bya //
T02TD2748E:131a-25: kha na ma tho med dran bcas //
T02TD2748E:131a-26: rnal 'byor rnam par mi rtog dang //
T02TD2748E:131a-27: byams ldan kun tu yid gzhungs pa //
T02TD2748E:131a-28: rjes spyod dge tshogs brtsam par bya //
T02TD2748E:131a-29: sems ngal so ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
